alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 4:36AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Forrest, northeastern Lamar and southeastern Jones Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 435 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Hattiesburg, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hattiesburg, West Hattiesburg and Oak Grove around 440 AM CDT. Petal, Rawls Springs and Sunrise around 445 AM CDT. Eastabuchie and Macedonia around 450 AM CDT. Moselle around 455 AM CDT. Laurel, Ellisville and Ovett around 500 AM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 505 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern Mississippi.
